archimate:TechnologyService.name: Authorization Service
archimate:TechnologyService.documentation:
Authorization Service
• Purpose: Fine-grained access control based on user roles and permissions • Methods: Role-based access control (RBAC), attribute-based access control (ABAC) • Features: Dynamic permissions, resource-level security, delegation, break-glass access • Integration: Healthcare role hierarchies, department-based access, patient consent management • Compliance: Minimum necessary access, segregation of duties, regular access reviews
